content.rendered:
The Mimosa C5x is the industry’s most versatile, modular, radio solution with five gain options (8, 12, 16, 20 and 25dBi). The ultra-rugged solution provides extended frequency operation from 4.9–6.4 GHz, with best-in-class noise immunity. Delivering the ultimate in flexibility and value, the C5x is the go-to solution for 5 GHz deployments.

Features

  • Sensitivity – -93 dBm
  • Wireless Frequency – 5 GHz
  • Transmission speed – 866 Mb/s
  • Antenna Type – Built-in
  • Antenna gain – 8 dBi
